name: Black Bass: Lure Fishing
overview: Now you can enter a summer-long fishing tournament in BLACK BASS LURE FISHING. At the beginning of the tournament, you have the lowest ranking and can only fish on one lake. But if you perform well enough and move up the ranks, your class will change and you will be able to choose which of the two lakes you want to fish on. Should you do really well and move into the top two classes, you will be given access to special techniques like Let Fish Go, 8 Magic, Power Lift, Dancing Worm, Dancing Frog, and Last Strike. Along the way, you will be able to use eight different lures to attract the big fish and your progress will be recorded using a password system. So hop in your boat and try to win the tournament in BLACK BASS LURE FISHING.
